name: Premium Black Hoodie
care: Machine wash cold, do not bleach, tumble dry low
description:
The Premium Black Hoodie from Clothique is designed for those who value comfort, durability, and modern street style. Crafted with a high-quality cotton-polyester blend, this hoodie offers a soft interior feel while maintaining a strong outer structure that resists wear and tear. The fabric is breathable yet warm, making it ideal for both chilly evenings and mild winter days.

The relaxed fit ensures all-day comfort whether you're heading to class, hanging out with friends, or running daily errands. Ribbed cuffs and hem provide a snug fit, while the adjustable drawstring hood adds both function and style. The front kangaroo pocket offers convenient storage for your phone, wallet, or hands.

This hoodie pairs effortlessly with jeans, joggers, or cargo pants, making it a versatile addition to your wardrobe. The deep black shade maintains its richness even after multiple washes, ensuring long-lasting style. Perfect for casual wear, travel, or light outdoor activities, this hoodie represents the perfect balance between fashion and practicality.

name: Classic White T-Shirt
care: Machine wash cold, iron on low heat
description:
The Classic White T-Shirt by Clothique is a timeless essential designed for everyday comfort and effortless style. Made from 100% organic cotton, this t-shirt feels soft against the skin while remaining breathable throughout the day. Its lightweight fabric makes it perfect for warm weather, layering in winter, or casual daily wear.

The tailored yet relaxed fit provides a clean silhouette without feeling restrictive. Reinforced stitching around the neckline and sleeves ensures durability, even after repeated washes. The crisp white color adds versatility, allowing you to pair it with jeans, chinos, shorts, or under a jacket for a smart-casual look.

Whether you're heading to work, going out with friends, or relaxing at home, this t-shirt adapts to every lifestyle. The natural cotton fibers help regulate body temperature and reduce irritation, making it ideal for long wear. Simple, stylish, and sustainable, this white t-shirt is a wardrobe staple for anyone who values quality and comfort.

name: Slim Fit Blue Jeans
care: Wash inside out, cold wash only
description:
Clothique’s Slim Fit Blue Jeans are designed for modern comfort with a classic denim look. The premium denim fabric is blended with elastane to provide stretch and flexibility, ensuring ease of movement throughout the day. These jeans contour naturally to your body while maintaining their shape over time.

The mid-rise waist and slim-leg cut create a clean, stylish appearance suitable for both casual and semi-formal occasions. Deep pockets and durable stitching enhance functionality and longevity. The rich blue wash adds depth and character, making them easy to match with t-shirts, shirts, or hoodies.

Perfect for daily wear, office-casual outfits, or weekend outings, these jeans offer comfort without compromising on style. The breathable fabric prevents overheating, while the stretch ensures all-day flexibility. If you're looking for reliable, stylish denim, this pair is an excellent choice.

name: Oversized Graphic T-Shirt
care: Cold wash, do not iron on print
description:
The Oversized Graphic T-Shirt is a bold fashion statement for those who love streetwear aesthetics. Made from premium cotton, it offers a soft, breathable feel that stays comfortable all day. The oversized fit provides a relaxed look while allowing easy movement.

The unique front graphic is printed using high-quality ink that resists fading and cracking. The fabric retains its shape after multiple washes, making it a reliable long-term addition to your wardrobe. The loose fit pairs perfectly with cargo pants, jeans, or shorts for a trendy urban look.

Ideal for casual outings, concerts, or daily wear, this t-shirt combines comfort with bold design. It’s a must-have for anyone who enjoys expressive, modern fashion.

name: Beige Casual Jacket
description:
The Beige Casual Jacket by Clothique blends elegance with everyday functionality. Crafted from a durable polyester blend, it provides warmth without feeling bulky. The structured design offers a sharp silhouette, while the soft inner lining ensures comfort during extended wear.

Its neutral beige color complements a wide range of outfits, from jeans and t-shirts to chinos and button-down shirts. The front zipper and deep pockets add both style and practicality.

This jacket is perfect for cool evenings, casual events, or light travel. Stylish, versatile, and comfortable, it enhances your wardrobe effortlessly.

name: Brown Cargo Pants
description:
The Brown Cargo Pants from Clothique are designed for both style and practicality. Made from durable cotton twill, these pants provide excellent comfort while maintaining a rugged look. The breathable fabric ensures all-day ease, making them ideal for long wear.

Featuring multiple utility pockets, these cargo pants offer convenient storage for your daily essentials like phone, wallet, or keys. The relaxed fit allows easy movement, while the structured design keeps your look sharp.

Perfect for casual outings, travel, or daily wear, these pants pair well with t-shirts, hoodies, or jackets. The earthy brown tone adds versatility to your wardrobe, giving you a reliable and fashionable option for everyday style.

name: Denim Jacket
description:
The Classic Denim Jacket by Clothique is a timeless piece that never goes out of style. Crafted from high-quality denim, it offers durability and comfort with a structured fit. The breathable fabric makes it suitable for year-round wear.

With reinforced stitching and sturdy metal buttons, this jacket is built to last. The chest and side pockets add both functionality and aesthetic appeal.

Pair it with jeans, chinos, or even over a hoodie for a layered look. Whether you're heading out for a casual day or a night with friends, this denim jacket adds effortless style to your outfit.

name: Grey Sweatpants
description:
These Grey Sweatpants are designed for ultimate comfort and everyday wear. Made with a soft cotton blend, they provide warmth without feeling heavy. The elastic waistband ensures a snug yet flexible fit.

Perfect for workouts, lounging, or casual outings, these sweatpants offer both style and comfort. The minimalist design allows easy pairing with hoodies or t-shirts.

Durable stitching and fade-resistant fabric ensure long-lasting quality, making them a reliable addition to your wardrobe.

name: Black Leather Jacket
description:
The Black Leather Jacket by Clothique brings a bold and confident look to your wardrobe. Crafted from premium faux leather, it offers a sleek appearance with a soft inner lining for comfort.

The tailored fit enhances your silhouette while maintaining flexibility. Zipper pockets provide secure storage and add to the jacket’s edgy design.

Ideal for night outings, bike rides, or stylish casual wear, this jacket is a statement piece that never goes unnoticed.

name: Striped Casual Shirt
description:
The Striped Casual Shirt is perfect for smart-casual occasions. Made from breathable cotton, it keeps you comfortable throughout the day. The slim fit design offers a clean and modern look.

The subtle stripe pattern adds style without being overwhelming. Pair it with jeans or chinos for a polished outfit.

Great for office wear, meetups, or casual events, this shirt balances comfort and elegance effortlessly.

name: Olive Green Hoodie
description:
The Olive Green Hoodie offers comfort and modern style. Made from a soft cotton-polyester blend, it provides warmth while remaining breathable.

The relaxed fit and adjustable hood make it perfect for casual wear. The olive shade adds a trendy touch to your outfit.

Ideal for daily wear, workouts, or travel, this hoodie is both functional and fashionable.

name: Formal Black Blazer
description:
The Formal Black Blazer is designed for elegance and professionalism. Made from a premium wool blend, it offers a refined fit and lasting comfort.

Its sharp cut and classic design make it suitable for business meetings, formal events, or evening wear.

Pair it with dress pants or chinos for a polished look that stands out.

name: Blue Checked Shirt
description:
This Blue Checked Shirt offers a classic yet modern look. The soft cotton fabric ensures comfort throughout the day.

The check pattern adds character, making it suitable for both casual and semi-formal wear.

A versatile piece that pairs well with jeans or trousers.

name: Navy Blue Shorts
description:
These Navy Blue Shorts are perfect for summer wear. Made from breathable fabric, they keep you cool and comfortable.

The relaxed fit ensures easy movement, making them ideal for casual outings or workouts.

Pair them with a t-shirt or tank top for a laid-back look.

name: Grey Zip Hoodie
description:
The Grey Zip Hoodie combines comfort with convenience. The front zipper allows easy wear, while the soft fabric keeps you warm.

It’s ideal for layering and works well with jeans or joggers.

A reliable everyday essential for casual style.

name: White Formal Shirt
description:
The White Formal Shirt is a must-have for professional settings. The crisp cotton fabric ensures comfort and a sharp appearance.

Its tailored fit enhances your look, making it suitable for office or formal events.

Pair it with trousers or a blazer for a complete outfit.

name: Black Jogger Pants
description:
Black Jogger Pants offer a perfect mix of comfort and sporty style. The elastic waistband ensures a flexible fit.

Ideal for workouts, travel, or casual wear, these joggers are both practical and stylish.

Pair them with hoodies or t-shirts for an effortless look.

name: Brown Wool Coat
description:
The Brown Wool Coat provides warmth and elegance. Made from a premium wool blend, it offers insulation without sacrificing style.

Perfect for winter wear, this coat enhances your formal and casual outfits.

A luxurious addition to your wardrobe.

name: Printed Summer Shirt
description:
This Printed Summer Shirt adds color and personality to your outfit. The lightweight cotton fabric keeps you cool.

The vibrant design is perfect for vacations, beach outings, or casual hangouts.

Style it with shorts or jeans for a fresh look.

name: Beige Chino Pants
description:
Beige Chino Pants offer a clean and versatile look. The breathable cotton fabric ensures comfort throughout the day.

Suitable for both casual and semi-formal wear, these chinos pair well with shirts or t-shirts.

A stylish and reliable wardrobe essential.
